Title: Three Sundays
Plot: Peggy's family hosts a lunch for their church's new priest; Don and Betty enjoy a weekend together; Freddy and Ken take a client out to lunch; the staff works to prepare for a last minute pitch meeting.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Mark Moses, Colin Hanks, Melinda McGraw, Talia Balsam
